document_data.name: One-Armed Magurk's
document_data.mainbody: '''One-Armed Magurk's''' was a shop in the town of [[Thunderstone]] in [[Cormyr]] in the late 1360s [[DR]] run by [[Magurk]].
document_data.Activities:
Magurk purchased—no questions asked—goods looted by adventurers from ruins and [[dungeon]]s found within the untamed wildernesses around Thunderstone: the [[Hullack Forest]], the [[Thunder Peaks]], and the [[Vast Swamp]]. He sold it on in his store, and thus his selection varied greatly over time, but generally included a varied collection of artworks, gems, and jewelry; weapons and armor; books; and used equipment.

As Magurk was a former soldier of the [[Purple Dragons]], the local contingent kept a close watch on the store.
